name: Inevitable (Laura del Pino Díaz, Jonatan Galindo Alvarez, Pelimorada, SabrinaP, Danipv3D)
name_original: Inevitable (Laura del Pino Díaz, Jonatan Galindo Alvarez, Pelimorada, SabrinaP, Danipv3D)
description:
THE WORLD IS IN YOUR HANDS!

A couple of votes are needed to save the planet from the MASSIVE CLIMATE CHANGE!

Meet Fiore and Selena in this visual novel and try convice them to put aside their egos in order to save the planet.
